Title: Baaraat Company
Writer: Syed Ahmad Afzal (dialogue), Syed Ahmad Afzal (screenplay), Ranveer Kumar (screenplay), Pankaj Matta (dialogue), Pankaj Matta (screenplay), Ramesh Mishra (screenplay), Ashutosh Tiwari (screenplay), A.M. Turaz (screenplay), A.M. Turaz (story)
Actors: Sandeepa Dhar, Anurita Jha, Rajendra Sethi, Jaihind Kumar
Plot: A man and his grandfather run a wedding company that tries to stop couples from eloping.
